title: Squared NG

nouns: A written message addressed to a person or organization
A letter is a written message from one party to another containing information.
A form of written communication; see also mail
A written message; a letter, note or memo.
A text that is written to and for a specific person or set of people (and is most commonly sent to them by post).
An activity that tracks the delivery of a letter. The activity can contain the electronic copy of the letter.
Written message containing information from one party to another

description:
The letters NG, shown enclosed in a square, which are an acronym for the words No Good.

The origin of NG refers to bloopers shown during or after the credits of a live television show in Japan (known as NGs), but can be used in any field as a form of shorthand for no good.
apple_vendor_description: The 'NG' button emoji on Apple devices presents a bold, stylized 'NG' in crisp white lettering against a vibrant red background. Its circular form boasts a subtle, glossy 3D shading that gives it a tactile, almost physical presence, a hallmark of Apple's design language.  This emoji powerfully signifies disapproval, a negative response, or a 'no go' situation, clearly communicating rejection with a distinct visual punch.
